content.p: Watch these videos from our current students from all around the world about their experiences in Malaysia. You can also read more about reasons to study in Malaysia and don't forget to browse the International Office website where you can find everything you need to know about life as an international student. Isra Afridi talks about leaving London behind to complete her undergraduate degree in Malaysia. Pouya Nayebi talks about growth and development at the Malaysia Campus. Omphile Mononga talks about why he chose to study at the Malaysia Campus. Summaya Babess on life in Malaysia and why she wants to stay. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
